name: Animals Path - tap and flips cube to change lane
name_original: Animals Path - tap and flips cube to change lane
description:
Test to your reflex with this game, the road is in zig zag and you need:

Tap to rotate and change lane
Don’t fall off the path
Unlock new characters
Unlock new scenarios
That shouldn't be too hard, right?

Be sure to get your friends to play to see who can get the furthest.

Good luck and have fun!
